name: Rope Hook - Draw Zipline
description:
Play is easy! Drag the rope to make a safe path, control all stick men in the rope and rescue them.

Do not forget to avoid obstacles along the way. Bomb, lazer, saw, gun,...are dangerous. You are in a rescue game, be careful with these obstacles.
It’s addictive! 

If you play Rope Hook, be sure you have nothing to do. You will play it for hours and can’t put it down.
